identity.name: Simon Flee Presskit
identity.target_audience: Club promoters, booking agents, festival organizers

scale.h1: text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase leading-[0.8]
scale.caption: text-xs md:text-sm font-mono uppercase tracking-widest

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay or concrete texture opacity-10
visual_enhancers.animations: Marquee text, hover-reveal images, smooth scroll (Lenis), sticky headers

layout_strategy.container: max-w-screen-2xl mx-auto border-x border-[#0A0A0A] min-h-screen bg-[#F2F2F2]

Hero.description: Split layout. Left: Massive typography 'SIMON FLEE' stacked vertically. Right: Artist photo with a 'cut-out' effect or monochrome filter that reveals color on hover.

Bio.description: Minimal text block. Large indentations. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for the text. Highlight key genres (House, Techno, Acid) in the Accent Color background.

MusicPlayer.description: Custom wrapper for Soundcloud/Mixcloud embeds. Use a 'cover' div that looks like a brutalist cassette tape or vinyl sleeve, which disappears on click to reveal the player.

TechRider.description: Data table style. Visible borders between rows. Mono font. Checkbox icons for 'Required' vs 'Optional'.

Contact.description: Massive links. Hovering over 'Email' or 'WhatsApp' changes the background color of that specific grid cell to Accent Color.

instructions_to_main_agent: Ensure the site is fully responsive. The grid should collapse to 1 column on mobile.
Do NOT use rounded corners. Keep everything sharp (rounded-none).
Use the provided Artist Photo as the centerpiece.
Implement a 'Marquee' effect for the artist name or genres.
The 'Tech Rider' section must be downloadable or easily printable (print CSS).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
